briefDescription: Shrimati Malati Dahanukar Trust (SMDT) is a 54 year old NGO established in 1960 to address the communityâ€™s needs in Shrirampur, Maharashtra. Our goal and motto is to empower the future generations through well researched training aids and programs. Be it in the field of health and nutrition or education, we work at the grassroots level ensuring proper, well guided continuous follow ups and quality control in the programmes.SMDT works in 5 core areas of community development :1.	Education. 2.	Health and Nutrition.3.	Livelihood empowerment.4.	Sports development.5.	Environmental sustainability
